scripts.deploy: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:optimize && vercel deploy
scripts.build:wasm: wasm-pack build -t web packages/alloc && wasm-pack build -t web packages/br-read && wasm-pack build -t web packages/br-write && wasm-pack build -t web packages/lz4 && wasm-pack build -t web packages/miniz && wasm-pack build -t web packages/zstd-read && wasm-pack build -t web packages/zstd-write && wasm-pack build -t web packages/zune && wasm-pack build -t web packages/libdeflate
